contexts.context: Sometimes we use <mark>double</mark>-hyphens instead of an em-dash for whatever reason--conceivably,...
...em-dash for whatever reason--conceivably, the tokenizer should skip <mark>double</mark> hyphens.
...possibly also U+058A ARMENIAN HYPHEN, and U+30A0 KATAKANA-HIRAGANA <mark>DOUBLE</mark> HYPHEN.
